ClassDesc: Describes a section of the Google Play Services API that should be made available. Instances of this should be passed into @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#GoogleApiClient#Builder#addApi_E@ to enable the appropriate parts of Google Play Services. Google APIs are partitioned into sections which allow your application to configure only the services it requires. Each Google API provides an API object which can be passed to @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#GoogleApiClient#Builder#addApi_E@ in order to configure and enable that functionality in your @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#GoogleApiClient_E@ instance. See @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#GoogleApiClient#Builder_E@ for usage examples.
